description: Test that create issues warnings with multiple EXRs if primaries mismatch and assign/convert-primaries is used.
command: ktx create --format R32G32B32A32_SFLOAT --${mode}-primaries bt709 --layers 2 input/exr/chromaticities_BT709.exr input/exr/chromaticities_${subcase}.exr output/create/colorspaces_warning/exr_primaries_mismatch_${subcase}_${mode}.ktx2
